attributes.action: We ask our MP's to reject the referendum that is in fact only an advisory.
attributes.additional_details:
The cost of this debacle has been so great that we still can't fully comprehend the damage that has been done to us financially and to our prospects of living and studying peacefully within the EU. 

We have been abused and lied to, Brexit was a shot across the bows to Cameron but also to the EU in its current form, we implore you to negotiate from within the EU and ensure that which is Sovereign acts in the interests of the country and votes to reject the advisory that is the referendum vote. Give us back our great country.
attributes.background: Whilst we watch in horror what Brexit has visited upon us we look to our MP's to recognise that many who voted to leave did so based on a devisive campaign of lies delivered by a team who have all since left the theatre.
